verses.roman:
sabāre vidāya dila karite śayana
ei-mata līlā kare śacīra nandana

synonyms: sabāre—unto everyone; vidāya—bidding farewell; dila—gave; karite śayana—to take rest; ei-mata—in this way; līlā—pastimes; kare—performed; śacīra nandana—the son of Śacī.
translation: Finally they all departed to rest in bed. In this way Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the son of Śacīmātā, performed His pastimes.
